text: She's set to make her first appearance on Saturday Night Live on Saturday, to coincide with her album release. And Cardi B was doing nothing to quash pregnancy rumours as she performed a warm - up gig on Friday night. The 25 - year - old rapper wore a voluminous frilly dress to hide her figure, for the appearance at E11EVEN club in Miami, Florida.
